| HistoryText             = 
The first Gamma Flight team was the second-tier training team to [[Alpha Flight (Earth-616)|Alpha Flight]]. The team consisted of [[Alexander Thorne (Earth-616)|Smart Alec]], [[Lillian Crawley (Earth-616)|Diamond Lil]], [[Madison Jeffries (Earth-616)|Madison Jeffries]] and [[Kyle Gibney (Earth-616)|Wild Child]]. When the government shut down [[Department H (Earth-616)|Department H]], the team disbanded.{{r|Alpha Flight #1}}

The second Gamma Flight was formed to replace Alpha Flight when the Canadian government deemed them uncontrollable. When the two teams first met, they were in conflict; their relationship was competitive and adversarial.The two teams became allies while battling [[Llan (Earth-616)|Llan the Sorcerer]]. After Llan was defeated the Canadian government decided to disband Gamma Flight. Only [[Ananym (Earth-616)|Witchfire]] remained with Department H and the Alpha Flight program after that.{{r|Alpha Flight #76|90}}

A third Gamma Flight arose under this new program, a categorization for the science & research inclined members of Alpha Flight.{{r|Alpha Flight #95}}
